languages.text: "Что же, давайте! Творите мерзость! Император и без того зрит всю гниль и падение, что царят в ваших душах, а я на Его суждение уповаю!"

traits.locale_text: "Что же, давайте! Творите мерзость! Император и без того зрит всю гниль и падение, что царят в ваших душах, а я на Его суждение уповаю!"

languages.text: "Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgement!"
languages.original_text: "Что же, давайте! Творите мерзость! Император и без того зрит всю гниль и падение, что царят в ваших душах, а я на Его суждение уповаю!"

traits.locale_text: "Go ahead, then! Breed depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes on His judgment!"
"Go ahead, then! Breed depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes on His judgment!"
"Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgment!"
"Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgment!"
"Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgement!"

languages.text: 「ならば行け！思いのかぎり堕落しろ！皇帝は既にお前たちの魂が腐敗し卑屈になっているのを見ている。私は彼の審判に希望を託す！」
languages.original_text: "Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: 「ならば行け！思いのかぎり堕落しろ！皇帝は既にお前たちの魂が腐敗し卑屈になっているのを見ている。私は彼の審判に希望を託す！」

languages.text: “继续说吧！继续堕落下去吧！帝皇已经看到了你们灵魂中的腐朽和卑贱，我期待着祂的审判！”
languages.original_text: "Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: “继续说吧！继续堕落下去吧！帝皇已经看到了你们灵魂中的腐朽和卑贱，我期待着祂的审判！”

languages.text: «¡Adelante, pues! ¡Dé rienda suelta a su depravación! El Emperador ya es consciente de la podredumbre y la mezquindad que moran en su alma. ¡Espero que su juicio sea implacable!».
languages.original_text: "Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Adelante, pues! ¡Dé rienda suelta a su depravación! El Emperador ya es consciente de la podredumbre y la mezquindad que moran en su alma. ¡Espero que su juicio sea implacable!».

languages.text: « Eh bien, allez-y ! Laissez libre cours à votre dépravation ! L'Empereur voit déjà la bassesse et la décadence qui règnent dans vos âmes, et je suis convaincu qu'Il saura vous juger le temps venu ! »
languages.original_text: "Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, allez-y ! Laissez libre cours à votre dépravation ! L'Empereur voit déjà la bassesse et la décadence qui règnent dans vos âmes, et je suis convaincu qu'Il saura vous juger le temps venu ! »

languages.text: "Dann los! Lasst Eurer Verderbtheit freien Lauf! Der Imperator sieht bereits die Fäulnis und Niedertracht in Euren Seelen, und ich setze meine Hoffnung in Sein Urteil!"
languages.original_text: "Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: "Dann los! Lasst Eurer Verderbtheit freien Lauf! Der Imperator sieht bereits die Fäulnis und Niedertracht in Euren Seelen, und ich setze meine Hoffnung in Sein Urteil!"

languages.text: "Hadi o hâlde! Ahlaksızlığınızı açığa çıkarın! İmparator, ruhlarınıza hükmeden çürümüşlüğü ve adiliği zaten görüyor. İtimatım O'nun adaletinedir!"
languages.original_text: "Go on, then! Wreak your depravity! The Emperor already sees all the rot and baseness that reign in your souls, and I place my hopes in His judgement!"

traits.locale_text: "Hadiyin o hâlde! Ahlaksızlığınızı açığa çıkarın! İmparator, ruhlarınıza hükmeden çürümüşlüğü ve adiliği zaten görüyor ve ben de O'nun adaletine güveniyorum!"
